sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Retrieves the JSON object of the required issue.

Inputs:

  • Connection Alias - Connection Alias Record you wish to use in the action.
  • Issue ID - Unique ID of the issue.

Outputs:

  • Issue - Issue in the JSON format.
  • Status - - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Jira, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • The Jira instance is unreachable or down as the request has timed out.
  • Issue does not exist or you do not have permission to access it.
  • Either the URL to the Jira Cloud instance is incorrect, or the server is unreachable or down.
  • User does not exist.
  • You are not authorized to perform this action. Check your credentials.

To use this action, the corresponding Jira connection and credential must be created and associated with the Jira Connection & Credential alias.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Retrieves the JSON object of the required issue.

Inputs:

  • Connection Alias - Connection Alias Record you wish to use in the action.
  • Issue ID - Unique ID of the issue.

Outputs:

  • Issue - Issue in the JSON format.
  • Status - - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to “Success”. If there is a failure in Jira, Status is set to “Error”.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.

Error Messages:

  • The Jira instance is unreachable or down as the request has timed out.
  • Issue does not exist or you do not have permission to access it.
  • Either the URL to the Jira Cloud instance is incorrect, or the server is unreachable or down.
  • User does not exist.
  • You are not authorized to perform this action. Check your credentials.

To use this action, the corresponding Jira connection and credential must be created and associated with the Jira Connection & Credential alias.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More
